title: This service is only available to users at or over the age of 16

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age
tosdr.tldr: The Cloud Terms of Service specifies that, "The Cloud Products are not intended for, and should not be used by, anyone under the age of 16. You are responsible for ensuring that all End Users are at least 16 years old."
